mcq.statement: Which area, later known as the North-West Frontier Province, was annexed by the East India Company after the Second Anglo-Sikh War?
mcq.one_liner: The area that later became the **North-West Frontier Province** was annexed by the East India Company after the Second Anglo-Sikh War.

suggestions.topic: Sikh Dynasty, First/Second Anglo-Sikh War & Rulers
